Public Instance methods

bioportal_form_complete(options,html_options={})

options include 

 - name - the name thats used as a prefix to the element names
 - ontology_ids - arrays of ontology_ids (an element of "all" indicates all ontologies)
 - no_javascript_include - if present will not include the javascript_include_tag for the bioportal_form_complete.js
 - value - uri,shortid or name. defaults to name

[Source]

    # File app/helpers/bio_portal_helper.rb, line 48
48:   def bioportal_form_complete options,html_options={}
49:     options[:value]||="name"
50:     result = ""
51:     result += javascript_include_tag("bioportal_form_complete.js") unless options[:no_javascript_include]
52: 
53:     html_options[:class]="bp_form_complete-#{options[:ontology_ids].join(',')}-#{options[:value]}"
54:     name = options[:name]
55:     result += text_field_tag name,nil,html_options
56:     return result
57:   end
